verses.verse: Not to us, <WH3068> Yahweh, not to us, <WH8034> but to your name give <WH5414> glory, <WH3519> for your loving kindness, <WH2617> and for your truth <WH571>'s sake.
Why should the nations <WH1471> say, <WH559> "Where is their God, <WH430> now?"
But our God <WH430> is in the heavens. <WH8064> He does <WH6213> whatever he pleases. <WH2654>
Their idols <WH6091> are silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> the work <WH4639> of men <WH120>'s hands. <WH3027>
They have mouths, <WH6310> but they don't <WH1696> speak. They have eyes, <WH5869> but they don't <WH7200> see.
They have ears, <WH241> but they don't <WH8085> hear. They have noses, <WH639> but they don't <WH7306> smell.
They have hands, <WH3027> but they don't <WH4184> feel. They have feet, <WH7272> but they don't <WH1980> walk, neither do they speak <WH1897> through their throat. <WH1627>
Those who make <WH6213> them will be like them; <WH982> yes, everyone who trusts in them.
Israel, <WH3478> trust <WH982> in Yahweh! <WH3068> He is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
House <WH1004> of Aaron, <WH175> trust <WH982> in Yahweh! <WH3068> He is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
You who fear <WH3373> Yahweh, <WH3068> trust <WH982> in Yahweh! <WH3068> He is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
Yahweh <WH3068> remembers <WH2142> us. <WH1288> He will bless us. <WH1288> He will bless the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478> He will bless <WH1288> the house <WH1004> of Aaron. <WH175>
He will bless <WH1288> those who fear <WH3373> Yahweh, <WH3068> both small <WH6996> and great. <WH1419>
May Yahweh <WH3068> increase <WH3254> you more and more, <WH1121> you and your children.
Blessed <WH1288> are you by Yahweh, <WH3068> who made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth. <WH776>
The heavens <WH8064> are the heavens <WH8064> of Yahweh; <WH3068> but the earth <WH776> has he given <WH5414> to the children <WH1121> of men. <WH120>
The dead <WH4191> don't <WH1984> praise Yah, <WH3050> neither any who go down <WH3381> into silence; <WH1745>
But we will bless <WH1288> Yah, <WH3050> from this time forth and forevermore. <WH5704> <WH5769> Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050>
